petitionerArgument.summaryOfViolation: Landlord's failure to register rental unit with Rent Stabilization Program prior to imposing utility charges and rent increases

rationale.respondentHadNotice: Yes, landlord was aware of registration requirement through city website
rationale.evidenceAssessment: Found landlord failed to register unit and improperly imposed utility charges without authorization
rationale.impactAssessment: Tenant was charged unlawful rent increases and utility costs above maximum legal rent
